CustomField.description:
Total count of quotes created in the past 30 days . This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Count_Created_Last_30_Days__c
Criteria for created quote is created date - today <=30.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Count of all quotes created in the last 30 days for related accounts.
CustomField.label: Quotes Created Last 30 Days
